name: Last One Left (chuntao.lin)
description:
Last One Left

You wake up in a strange facility and seem to be the only survivor. Find out what happened and escape from this place.

Any bugs let me know in the community->Bug Report forum.

This is a prototype, not a finished product. Many visual aspects are placeholder and some systems are not implemented.

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Turn Camera - Mouse

Interact - E

Journal - Tab

Pause - Escape/Backspace

Run - Left Shift
